actions.componentDescription: Google Mail, commonly known as Gmail, is a widely used email service by Google, offering free and feature-rich communication, organization, and storage capabilities accessible through web browsers and mobile apps.
actions.description: Get an email from your Gmail account via Id
actions.name: getMail

properties.description: The ID of the message to retrieve.
properties.name: id
properties.label: ID

properties.description: The format to return the message in.
properties.name: format
properties.label: Format

options.description: Returns only email message ID and labels; does not return the email headers, body, or payload.
options.label: Minimal

options.description: Returns the full email message data with body content parsed in the payload field; the raw field is not used. Format cannot be used when accessing the api using the gmail.metadata scope.
options.label: Full

options.description: Returns the full email message data with body content in the raw field as a base64url encoded string; the payload field is not used. Format cannot be used when accessing the api using the gmail.metadata scope.
options.label: Raw

options.description: Returns only email message ID, labels, and email headers.
options.label: Metadata

properties.description: When given and format is METADATA, only include headers specified.
properties.name: metadataHeaders
properties.label: Metadata headers

actions.title: Get Mail

actions.componentDescription: Google Mail, commonly known as Gmail, is a widely used email service by Google, offering free and feature-rich communication, organization, and storage capabilities accessible through web browsers and mobile apps.
actions.name: getThread

properties.description: The ID of the thread to retrieve.
properties.name: id
properties.label: ID

properties.description: The format to return the message in.
properties.name: format
properties.label: Format

options.description: Returns only email message ID and labels; does not return the email headers, body, or payload.
options.label: Minimal

options.description: Returns the full email message data with body content parsed in the payload field; the raw field is not used. Format cannot be used when accessing the api using the gmail.metadata scope.
options.label: Full

options.description: Returns the full email message data with body content in the raw field as a base64url encoded string; the payload field is not used. Format cannot be used when accessing the api using the gmail.metadata scope.
options.label: Raw

options.description: Returns only email message ID, labels, and email headers.
options.label: Metadata

properties.description: When given and format is METADATA, only include headers specified.
properties.name: metadataHeaders
properties.label: Metadata headers

actions.title: Get Thread

actions.componentDescription: Google Mail, commonly known as Gmail, is a widely used email service by Google, offering free and feature-rich communication, organization, and storage capabilities accessible through web browsers and mobile apps.
actions.description: Lists the messages in the user's mailbox.
actions.name: searchEmail

properties.description: Maximum number of messages to return.
properties.name: maxResults
properties.label: Max results

properties.description: Page token to retrieve a specific page of results in the list.
properties.name: pageToken
properties.label: Page token

properties.description: Only return messages matching the specified query. Supports the same query format as the Gmail search box. For example, "from:someuser@example.com rfc822msgid:<somemsgid@example.com> is:unread". Parameter cannot be used when accessing the api using the gmail.metadata scope.
properties.name: q
properties.label: Q

properties.description: Only return messages with labels that match all of the specified label IDs. Messages in a thread might have labels that other messages in the same thread don't have.
properties.name: labelIds
properties.label: Label IDs

properties.description: Include messages from SPAM and TRASH in the results.
properties.name: includeSpamTrash
properties.label: Include spam trash

actions.title: Search Email

actions.componentDescription: Google Mail, commonly known as Gmail, is a widely used email service by Google, offering free and feature-rich communication, organization, and storage capabilities accessible through web browsers and mobile apps.
actions.description: Sends the specified message to the recipients in the To, Cc, and Bcc headers.
actions.name: sendEmail

properties.description: Email address of the sender, the mailbox account.
properties.name: from
properties.label: From

properties.description: A list of attachments to send with the email.
properties.name: attachments
properties.label: Attachments

actions.title: Send Email

connection.componentDescription: Google Mail, commonly known as Gmail, is a widely used email service by Google, offering free and feature-rich communication, organization, and storage capabilities accessible through web browsers and mobile apps.
